settings.title: Our Approach to Formulation
settings.content:
Unlike typical supplement companies that chase trends, we work backward from results. Every States formula begins with a clear outcome in mind, then uses only ingredients with clinical evidence supporting that specific outcome.

We use patented, trademarked ingredients whenever possible because they offer guaranteed potency and verified research. This costs more, but ensures you get exactly what the science says works.

We also use clinical doses - the exact amounts shown to be effective in research studies. No fairy-dusting or proprietary blends that hide inadequate amounts.
